entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: The protagonist of the series, a wizard who is prophesied to defeat Lord Voldemort. He hunts Horcruxes and eventually masters the Deathly Hallows.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Lord Voldemort
entities.description: The primary antagonist, a dark wizard seeking immortality through Horcruxes and domination over the wizarding and muggle worlds.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Albus Dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts and founder of the Order of the Phoenix. He mentors Harry in hunting Horcruxes before his death.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Severus Snape
entities.description: The Potions Master and later Headmaster of Hogwarts. He acts as a double agent for Dumbledore while appearing to serve Voldemort.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Ronald Weasley
entities.description: Harry's best friend who accompanies him on the hunt for Horcruxes.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Hermione Granger
entities.description: Harry's best friend, known for her intelligence and magical skill. She plays a crucial role in the Horcrux hunt.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Ginevra Weasley
entities.description: Ron's sister and Harry's love interest. She co-leads Dumbledore's Army in Harry's absence.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Draco Malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student tasked by Voldemort to kill Dumbledore. He unwittingly becomes the master of the Elder Wand.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Bellatrix Lestrange
entities.description: A fanatical Death Eater and Voldemort's most loyal servant.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Neville Longbottom
entities.description: A Gryffindor student who leads the resistance at Hogwarts and destroys the final Horcrux, Nagini.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Molly Weasley
entities.description: The matriarch of the Weasley family.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: The Elder Wand
entities.description: One of the Deathly Hallows, an unbeatable wand sought by Voldemort.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: The Resurrection Stone
entities.description: One of the Deathly Hallows, capable of recalling the dead. It was set in Marvolo Gaunt's ring and turned into a Horcrux.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: The Invisibility Cloak
entities.description: One of the Deathly Hallows, a cloak that renders the wearer completely invisible and does not fade with age.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Slytherin's Locket
entities.description: A locket originally belonging to Salazar Slytherin, turned into a Horcrux by Voldemort.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Hufflepuff's Cup
entities.description: A cup originally belonging to Helga Hufflepuff, stolen by Tom Riddle and turned into a Horcrux.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Ravenclaw's Diadem
entities.description: A diadem belonging to Rowena Ravenclaw, turned into a Horcrux and hidden in the Room of Requirement.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Sword of Gryffindor
entities.description: A goblin-made sword belonging to Godric Gryffindor, capable of destroying Horcruxes because it is impregnated with basilisk venom.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Nagini
entities.description: Voldemort's giant pet snake and the final Horcrux to be created.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Regulus Arcturus Black
entities.description: Sirius Black's brother, a Death Eater who turned against Voldemort and stole the locket Horcrux.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 6 - Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Dobby
entities.description: A free house-elf who rescues Harry and his friends from Malfoy Manor.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

entities.name: Battle of Hogwarts
entities.description: The final battle between Voldemort's forces and the defenders of Hogwarts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 7 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_section_06.txt

relationships.description: Snape kills Dumbledore on the Astronomy Tower, as per their prior agreement.
relationships.evidence: Snape raised his wand and pointed it directly at Dumbledore. 'Avada Kedavra!'

relationships.description: Harry defeats Voldemort when the Killing Curse rebounds.
relationships.evidence: Tom Riddle hit the floor with a mundane finality... Voldemort was dead, killed by his own rebounding curse

relationships.description: Voldemort orders Nagini to kill Snape in an attempt to master the Elder Wand.
relationships.evidence: The snake's fangs pierced his neck... I regret it,' said Voldemort coldly.

relationships.description: Molly Weasley kills Bellatrix during the Battle of Hogwarts.
relationships.evidence: Molly's curse soared beneath Bellatrix's outstretched arm and hit her squarely in the chest, directly over her heart.

relationships.description: Bellatrix kills Dobby with a silver knife as he escapes Malfoy Manor.
relationships.evidence: The elf swayed slightly, stars reflected in his wide, shining eyes. Together, he and Harry looked down at the silver hilt of the knife protruding from the elf's heaving chest.

relationships.description: Neville kills Nagini with the Sword of Gryffindor.
relationships.evidence: With a single stroke Neville sliced off the great snake's head

relationships.description: Snape provides Harry with his memories to reveal the truth about Dumbledore's plan and Harry's destiny.
Harry and Ginny are married with children in the future.
relationships.evidence: Harry, Ginny, Lily, and Albus had drawn right up to them.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione are married with children in the future.
relationships.evidence: Ron... Make sure you beat him in every test, Rosie. Thank God you inherited your mother's brains.

relationships.description: Snape acts as a Death Eater but is secretly loyal to Dumbledore.
relationships.evidence: Severus Snape was never the true master of the Elder Wand. He never defeated Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Harry becomes the true master of the Elder Wand after disarming Draco Malfoy.
relationships.evidence: I am the true master of the Elder Wand.

relationships.description: Regulus stole the locket from the cave to destroy it.
relationships.evidence: I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it as soon as I can.

relationships.description: Harry plays a central role in the Battle of Hogwarts, defeating Voldemort.
relationships.evidence: Harry Potter is dead! ... He beat you!
